title: GeoParquet
description: Parquet metadata included in the geo field.

version.description: The version of the geoparquet metadata standard used when writing.

primary_column.description: The name of the 'primary' geometry column.

columns.description: Metadata about geometry columns, with each key is the name of a geometry column in the table.

encoding.description: Name of the geometry encoding format. Currently only 'WKB' is supported.

geometry_type.description: The geometry type(s) of all geometries, or 'Unknown' if they are not known.

crs.description: WKT2 representing the Coordinate Reference System (CRS) of the geometry.

edges.description: Name of the coordinate system for the edges. Must be one of 'planar' or 'spherical'. The default value is 'planar'.

bbox.description: Bounding Box of the geometries in the file, formatted according to RFC 7946, section 5.

items.description: The westmost constant longitude line that bounds the rectangle (xmin).
The minimum constant latitude line that bounds the rectangle (ymin).
The eastmost constant longitude line that bounds the rectangle (xmax).
The maximum constant latitude line that bounds the rectangle (ymax).

epoch.description: Coordinate epoch in case of a dynamic CRS, expressed as a decimal year.
